casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jamal M. WATSON No. 107P18 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina Daniel F. Read, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Watson, Jamal M.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 23rd of April 2018 by State of NC in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."
